body: Java SDK has [ActivityInterceptor](https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-java/blob/30420212a26283cf7cbe6339512058a3186074e8/temporal-sdk/src/main/java/io/temporal/common/interceptors/ActivityInterceptor.java#L22) and Go SDK misses one.

comments.body: This one would be really useful, especially for logging, tracing, of activities etc... @mfateev any possible update on timeline ?

title: Add ActivityInterceptor
